name: Comic Book RPGs:  Immortal Souls Sequel (Canceled)
blurb: Become Immortal in this Comic Book RPG!  100% hand drawn characters and animated backgrounds!

rewards.reward: Upstanding Citizen:  We'll send you a digital copy of our first (just recently released) game \u201cImmortal Souls:  John Turner #1\u201d for your PC or Mac (save $10!).  Your name will also be listed in the Thank You credits of the free flash game.

Sequel Hero:  You will get the sequel to Immortal Souls for your Mac or PC when it is released!  (Plus the first game which is available now).  The sequel will include our beautiful hand-drawn isometric exploration areas, dialogue options and more!  Your name will be listed in the Thank You credits of both the free flash version and the sequel.

Comic Book Avenger:  You get the first game plus, the sequel, *plus* the digital comic book \u201cImmortal Souls:  Origins\u201d, the first 10 pages\u201d - (You get 7 never-before seen comic book pages!).  When the "Origins" comic is finished you will also get a digital copy of the complete 22 page book.

Intergalactic Subscriber:  A lifetime subscription to ALL Immortal Souls games for the PC & Mac (plus all of the above pledge rewards, our first game, sequel and comic).  This includes any sequels and expansions, they will be yours, free of charge, forever.  If we release an Immortal Souls \u201cPart 8\u201d ten years from now, you will still get a copy! (Mac, PC, & Apple Iphone)

Eternal Legend:  All of the above, the lifetime subscription plus you will get a HARD COVER version of the comic book  "Immortal Souls:  Origins" when it's complete.  On the first page will be a "Made Possible By" section, where your name will featured!  Included will be a "Thank you\u201d card featuring a character from Immortal Souls & signed by Bobby K. Richardson and mailed to your address.

Mythic Paragon:  All of the above (the games, lifetime subscription, hard cover), plus a secret artifact will be hidden in the sequel with your name on it, such as "John Smith's Shield of Strength".  When players find these artifacts they will give players a +1 permanent stat point!  You can even choose what your artifact is called! "John Smith's Golden Can of Cheese Whiz"?

"The Transcender":  Our artist will create a digital version of you in the sequel!  Your character will have your name (if you choose) and your likeness, you can choose to be:  1)  Bystander who says a random line you can choose (example "Why did it have to be vampires...?")  2)  A character with a mission to give our hero.  You will have both an animated isometric version and a character dialogue version, that's 2 characticures!  We'll also modify your clothes/costume if you want (Want to be a pimp... or maybe a vampire?  8 legged half human spider??).  We will also mail to your address a printed version of your character perfect for hanging on the wall!  This reward includes all rewards from the above pledges.

"The Immortal" Game Designer Package - Ever wanted your name stored in the halls of IMDB and Wikipedia?  We will design and animate a character according to your specifications (whatever you want him/her to be, however they look like, how they attack, and their name), everyone will fighting your amazing enemy in the Immortal Souls sequel.  In addition you will be credited as a game-designer in the actual game and listed on IMDB and the internet with the rest of the team!  You will also get the perks of the above pledges except for "The Transcender".

Alpha Omega Game Game Producer Package - You will get the digital copies and lifetime subscription to Immortal Souls,hard cover, plus you will also be credited as an Associate Producer on the Immortal Souls sequel.  You can also design an enemy and be credited as a Game Designer too, just like the Game Designer package.  Basically the same as all the above, except it does not include the "Transcender" reward.
